1102 // another character (not the current one) fails, the other character(s) are not informed.
1103 // We must inform them when they get loaded the next time.
1104 // Only active missions need checking, failed/complete will not change anymore.

bool avatar::read ( item_location  loc,
bool  continuous = false 
)

Handles reading effects and returns true if activity started.

Explanation of ACT_READ activity values:

position: ID of the reader targets: 1-element vector with the item_location (always in inventory/wielded) of the book being read index: We are studying until the player with this ID gains a level; 0 indicates reading once values: IDs of the NPCs who will learn something str_values: Parallel to values, these contain the learning penalties (as doubles in string form) as follows: Experience gained = Experience normally gained * penalty
